scripts.init-project: yarn; cd client; yarn; cd ../shared; yarn; cd ../server; yarn; cd ..
scripts.prebuild-web: cd ./client; yarn; cd ../shared; yarn; yarn build-client;
scripts.build: cd ./shared; yarn; yarn build-client; cd ../client; yarn; yarn build; yarn build-web;  cd ../server; yarn;
scripts.build-ios: cd client; yarn build; yarn build-mobile; cd ../mobile; yarn build-ios;
scripts.deploy: git checkout deploy; git pull origin master; git stage .; git commit -m'merged master into deploy'; git push origin deploy; git checkout master
scripts.release: git checkout release; git pull origin master; git stage .; git commit -m'merged master into release'; git push origin release; git checkout master
